root: ^“Sir, from all the fishing we are doing it is possible we might cause damage to the local river, I have some ideas. What do you want to do?”

c-0: ^“Sir, establishing the limits for fishing may be bad for a few days but should be good for us in the long run.”
^No Fish for 3 days, +25 Fish after 3 days
c-1: ^“Sir, after we began following the new practices we’ve been able to revitalize the river!”
c-2: ^“Sir there aren’t many fish left in the river now, the fishery will be slower for now.”
